title: You've found something special at The Covington Apartments! Studio.
posting_body: ['The Covington Apartments', 'Visit our community today!', '5800 American Blvd W Bloomington, MN 55437', 'show contact info', 'Unit Rates:', '$1475/month', 'Unit Type:', 'Studio-BR 1-BA', 'Unit Size:', '536 sq ft', 'Lease Terms:', '3-Month, 4-Month, 5-Month, 6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month, 13-Month, 14-Month, 15-Month, 16-Month', 'Pet Policy:', 'Pet Friendly - Max 2 allowed, One time Fee $300.00, Rent $40.00, Deposit $200.00, Breed Restrictions Apply.', 'What you’ll find in our community:', '◾ Business Center', '◾ Cardio Machines', '◾ Coffee Station', '◾ Elevator', '◾ Fire Pits', '◾ Free Weights', '◾ Online Payments', '◾ Pond', '◾ Sundeck', '◾ Weight Machines', '◾ Barbecue/Grill Area', '◾ Corporate Suites', '◾ Dry Cleaning Service', '◾ Maintenance on Site', '◾ Massages Offered', '◾ Package Deliver to Apartment', '◾ Planned Social Activities', '◾ Reservable Clubhouse', '◾ Welcoming Lobby Areas', '◾ Yoga Classes Offered', 'Description:', 'Amazing.', 'Great staff.', 'The best.', 'A great place to call home.', "These words aren't ours-", "they're just some of the incredible reviews that you'll find describing The Covington Apartment Homes in Bloomington, Minnesota.", 'We work hard to make The Covington a great place to live, and we would love to welcome you into our friendly apartment community.', 'This unit comes with:', '◾ Air Conditioning', '◾ Floor to Ceiling Windows', '◾ Full-Size Washer/Dryer in Every Home', '◾ Maple Cabinetry', '◾ Microwave', '◾ Nature and City Views', '◾ Plank Flooring', '◾ Sliding Glass Doors', '◾ Storage Space', '◾ Walk-In Closets', 'Call or visit our website to schedule a personal tour!', 'Office Phone:', 'show contact info', 'Mon - Thu: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Fri - Sat: 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Website:', '<URL>', 'Property Management:', 'Weidner Apartment Homes, LLC', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'A56CC6D3E8D240']
